artist: Artist: Clarence Morgan; Designer: Ken Botnick; Publisher: Emdash Press, St. Louis
creditline: Gift of the Print and Drawing Council
medium: Color inkjet prints, letterpress; bound volume
provenance: The artist, Minneapolis; sold to MIA, 2001.
signed: Signed by artist and author on colophon page: Clarence Morgan / Ken Botnick
text: In this collaborative artist's book, longtime friends Morgan and Botnick explore the hidden realm of the creative process using Morgan's own working sketchbooks as sources of insight and discovery. The book reproduces selected writings and images from the sketchbooks, along with quotes on creativity from various noted writers and thinkers.
title: Clarence Morgan: Sketchbooks
